title: This game is literally unplayable in this state.
body:
Every 4 out of 5 games league crashes. This gives me a huge handicap since the crashes always occur early game. laning against someone 2 lvs higher than you is terrible especially if the enemy capitalizes on it. 

I know Riot said that it is not their fault and Apple has to fix it and I understand but you can't expect us to play like this. If this problem isn't fixed soon, me and many other users will have no option but to stop playing. I'm getting flamed and reported for a problem that I can't do anything about (except splurge on a new computer for no reason).

Imagine it like this. If a chair manufacturer found out that their wood makes the chair unusable for 20% of their consumers, they wouldn't say "sorry we can't do anything about it. It's the wood company that's in the wrong". They would contact the wood industry and find a solution.

I actually somewhat fixed the problem I was having. By default vertical syncing is disabled and it was causing flickering and glitches when opening up menus or the item shop. Enabling the syncing fixed those issues and now the action is butter smooth even on my old 2013 13inch macbook pro.
